code: import{routes}from'./Rotas.js';export const getBasename=()=>{const pathArray=window.location.pathname.split('/').filter(Boolean);const basename=pathArray.join('/');const lastPart=pathArray[pathArray.length-1];if(pathArray.length>0){if(routes.some(route=>route.path==="/".concat(lastPart)))return"/".concat(pathArray.slice(0,-1).join('/'),"/");else return"/".concat(basename,"/");}return'/';};export const setBasenameInLocalStorage=basename=>{if(!localStorage.getItem("basename")){localStorage.setItem("basename",basename);}};export const getBasenameInLocalStorage=()=>{return localStorage.getItem("basename");};
